sentence.Network_en: On the money markets the dollar was weaker against European currencies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在货币市场上，美元不如欧洲货币坚挺。

sentence.Network_en: The men were daily becoming weaker from want of rest.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于缺乏休息，这些男人日渐虚弱。
实力较弱的网络公司倒闭了。

entry.def: If someone is weak, they are not healthy or do not have good muscles, so that they cannot move quickly or carry heavy things.

example.ex: I was too weak to move or think or speak...
example.tran: 我太虚弱了，无法动弹，无法思考，也无法说话。

example.ex: His arms and legs were weak.
example.tran: 他的四肢虚弱无力。

entry.tran: (器官或感官)功能差的，受损伤的
entry.def: If someone has an organ or sense that is weak, it is not very effective or powerful, or is likely to fail.

example.ex: Until the beating, Cantanco's eyesight had been weak, but adequate...
example.tran: 挨打前坎坦科的视力就一直很弱，不过也还勉强看得见。

example.ex: She tired easily and had a weak heart.
example.tran: 她很容易疲劳，心脏也不好。

entry.def: If you describe someone as weak, you mean that they are not very confident or determined, so that they are often frightened or worried, or easily influenced by other people.

example.ex: He was a nice doctor, but a weak man who wasn't going to stick his neck out...
example.tran: 他是位为人和蔼的医生，但胆小怕事，不敢冒什么风险。

example.ex: You have been conditioned to believe that it is weak to be scared.
example.tran: 你已经习惯性地认为害怕就是软弱。

entry.tran: (声音或笑容)微弱的，不热情的，无力的
entry.def: If you describe someone's voice or smile as weak, you mean that it is not very loud or big, suggesting that the person lacks confidence, enthusiasm, or physical strength.

example.ex: His weak voice was almost inaudible...
example.tran: 他的声音微弱，几乎听不见。

example.ex: He managed a weak smile.
example.tran: 他勉强挤出一丝笑容。

entry.tran: 不牢固的;易破的;易坏的
entry.def: If an object or surface is weak, it breaks easily and cannot support a lot of weight or resist a lot of strain.

example.ex: The owner said the bird may have escaped through a weak spot in the aviary...
example.tran: 鸟的主人说这只鸟可能是从鸟舍一处不结实的地方逃走的。

example.ex: Swimming is helpful for bones that are porous and weak.
example.tran: 游泳有助于改善骨质疏松和骨骼脆弱。

entry.def: A weak physical force does not have much power or intensity.

example.ex: The molecules in regular liquids are held together by relatively weak bonds...
example.tran: 常规液体里分子之间的键合力相对较弱。

example.ex: Strong winds can turn boats when the tide is weak.
example.tran: 潮水小的时候强风可以让船只改变航向。

entry.tran: 无权力的;无权威的;无影响力的
entry.def: If individuals or groups are weak, they do not have any power or influence.

example.ex: The council was too weak to do anything about it.
example.tran: 市政会手中无权，对此无能为力。

entry.tran: (政府或领导人) 软弱无力的
entry.def: A weak government or leader does not have much control, and is not prepared or able to act firmly or severely.

example.ex: The changes come after mounting criticism that the government is weak and indecisive...
example.tran: 随着对政府软弱和优柔寡断的批评愈演愈烈，情况终于有了变化。

example.ex: The chief editorial writer also blames weak leadership for the current crisis.
example.tran: 首席社论员也把当前的危机归咎于领导层软弱无力。

entry.tran: (货币、经济、产业、政府等)疲软的，有崩溃危险的
entry.def: If you describe something such a country's currency, economy, industry, or government as weak, you mean that it is not successful, and may be likely to fail or collapse.

example.ex: The weak dollar means American goods are relative bargains for foreigners...
example.tran: 美元疲软意味着美国的产品对外国人来说相对便宜。

example.ex: When the economy is weak, it's very hard for suppliers to raise their prices.
example.tran: 经济疲软时供货商很难提价。

entry.tran: (论据等)不充分的，没有说服力的;(逻辑)不周密的
entry.def: If something such as an argument or case is weak, it is not convincing or there is little evidence to support it.

example.ex: Do you think the prosecution made any particular errors, or did they just have a weak case?...
example.tran: 你认为公诉人犯了什么错误呢，还是根本就是证据不足？

example.ex: The claim exposed a weak point in the structure of facts upon which his argument rested...
example.tran: 这一主张暴露了支撑他论点的论据结构的一个弱点。

entry.def: A weak drink, chemical, or drug contains very little of a particular substance, for example because a lot of water has been added to it.

example.ex: ...a cup of weak tea...
example.tran: 一杯淡茶

example.ex: ...a very weak bleach solution.
example.tran: 高度稀释的漂白剂

entry.def: Your weak points are the qualities or talents you do not possess, or the things you are not very good at.

example.ex: You may very well be asked what your weak points are. Don't try to claim you don't have any...
example.tran: 你很可能会被问到有什么缺点。不要试图声称自己没有任何缺点。

example.ex: Geography was my weak subject...
example.tran: 地理是我的弱项。

entry.tran: （下巴）瘦小的;（尤暗指）性格懦弱的
entry.def: You can say that someone has a weak chin to indicate that their chin is not large, especially when you want to suggest that they do not have a strong character.

example.ex: She was a plain-looking woman with a weak chin.
example.tran: 她相貌平平，性格懦弱。

auth_sentence.content: Exporter stocks continued to benefit from a weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Exporter stocks continued to benefit from a weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exporter stocks continued to benefit from a weaker yen.

auth_sentence.content: Japanese stocks got some support from a weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Japanese stocks got some support from a weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Japanese stocks got some support from a weaker yen.

auth_sentence.content: Exporters also recovered, supported by the weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Exporters also recovered, supported by the weaker yen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exporters also recovered, supported by the weaker yen.
